#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main(){
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--){
		long long x1,y1,x2,y2,x3,y3,x4,y4,x5,y5,x6,y6;
		scanf("%lld %lld %lld %lld", &x1, &y1, &x2, &y2);
		scanf("%lld %lld %lld %lld", &x3, &y3, &x4, &y4);
		
		x5=max(x1,x3);  y5=max(y1,y3);  x6=min(x2,x4);  y6=min(y2,y4);
		if(x6-x5<=0 || y6-y5<=0)
			printf("%lld\n", (x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(x4-x3)*(y4-y3));
		else
			printf("%lld\n", (x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(x4-x3)*(y4-y3)-(x6-x5)*(y6-y5));
	}

	return 0;
}
